system_adv_sub_a18_030_001.msg_system: Collect 7 real Michio-kun figures hidden among the many fakes scattered throughout the plaza. Picking up a fake will cause it to explode, leaving Kasuga in a world of hurt. If his HP drops to 0, he'll be down for the count, so choose carefully.

system_adv_sub_a70_020_001.msg_system: You can enjoy all sorts of classic films at this theater, but in a comfy place like this, anyone is sure to get sleepy. Sleeping through these masterpieces would be a shame, so repel the mystical REM Rams before they have a chance to attack. If Kasuga can sit through the whole film without nodding off, his personality may improve.

system_adv_sub_a17_070_001.msg_system: Taka is now available on Poundmates!

system_adv_sub_a78_020_001.msg_system: You now have access to Poundmates.

system_adv_sub_a81_020_001.msg_system: You need at least Lv. 5 Confidence to get the words out properly.

system_adv_sub_a81_020_002.msg_system: Come back after raising your Confidence by obtaining certificates and playing minigames.

system_adv_sub_a81_060_001.msg_system: Chau Ka Long is now available on Poundmates!

system_adv_sub_a69_030_001.msg_system: This facility is all about developing one's personality. Passing exams will improve different facets of Kasuga's personality. After the free trial exam, you'll have to pay the exam fee.

system_adv_sub_a69_050_001.msg_system: Kasuga is now enrolled at Ounabara Vocational School.

system_adv_sub_a69_050_002.msg_system: Additional certification exams are now available. Any passed exams can be taken as a mock exam for free, as many times as you like.

system_adv_sub_a71_030_001.msg_system: Ikari can now negotiate in Management Mode.

adv11_0010.msg_system: With the fall of the Great Wall of Muscle and Yokohama's rising crime rate, the city's villains grow even more powerful. Be on the lookout, as you may encounter formidable, never-before-seen foes.

sadv04_0115.msg_system: The karaoke bar, Survive, has become the new hangout spot for Kasuga and his party!

sadv04_0117.msg_system: Talk to a party member after their bond gauge has filled to initiate a special substory known as a Drink Link. Seize this opportunity, as it will strengthen your ties with them.

sadv04_0118.msg_system: You can listen to previous party chats by speaking to Iroha.

c04_0007_02.msg_system: Enemies throughout the city will change their appearance according to Kasuga's wild imagination.

system_adv_sub_a80_200_002.msg_system: Unlike other party members, bonding with Eri requires a slightly different approach. The more Ichiban Confections grows, the deeper your bond, so flex those management muscles and show her what you can do!

system_adv_sub_a64_040_001.msg_system: You can craft and enhance your weapons and gear at the Romance Workshop. Scavenging the streets for materials and investing in the workshop's amenities will allow you to craft a wider variety of gear. Be sure to take full advantage of the workshop and improve your arsenal!

system_c04_0007_002.msg_system: Enemies throughout the city will change their appearance according to Kasuga's wild imagination.

system_sadv04_0115_001.msg_system: The karaoke bar, Survive, has become the new hangout spot for Kasuga and his party!

system_sadv04_0117_001.msg_system: Talk to a party member after their bond gauge has filled to initiate a special substory known as a Drink Link. Seize this opportunity, as it will strengthen your ties with them.

system_sadv04_0118_001.msg_system: You can listen to previous party chats by speaking to Iroha.

system_sadv04_0118_002.msg_system: You gave a Bouquet of Roses.

system_sadv04_0118_003.msg_system: You gave five Bouquets of Roses.

system_c05_0067_001.msg_system: You gave a Bouquet of Pansies.

system_c05_0067_002.msg_system: You gave five Bouquets of Pansies.

system_c05_0067_003.msg_system: You gave ten Bouquets of Pansies.

system_y_playspot_shikaku_help_002.msg_system: During an exam, press <symbol=button_sankaku> to activate Hyper Focus and extend your exam time by 30 seconds. This skill can only be activated once per exam.

system_y_playspot_shikaku_help_004.msg_system: During an exam, press <symbol=button_shikaku> to use The Divine Pencil and eliminate 2 wrong choices of the 4 available ones. This skill can only be activated once per exam.

system_y_playspot_shikaku_help_005.msg_system: When selecting an exam, you will be able to see which certificate improves which aspect of Kasuga's Personality.

system_y_playspot_shikaku_shop_001.msg_system: You gave a Bouquet of Lilies.

system_y_playspot_shikaku_shop_002.msg_system: You gave five Bouquets of Lilies.

system_y_playspot_shikaku_shop_003.msg_system: You gave ten Bouquets of Lilies.

system_adv_dragonkart04_001.msg_system: The Ignition Shadow kart is now available!

system_adv_dragonkart05_001.msg_system: The Rapid Phantom kart is now available!

system_adv_dragonkart06_001.msg_system: The Rumble Crasher kart is now available!

system_adv_dragonkart07_001.msg_system: The Rising Dragon kart is now available!

system_sadv04_0118_004.msg_system: You gave ten Bouquets of Roses.

system_adv_sub_a87_020_001.msg_system: Kasuga got a massive defense boost!

system_adv_tgs_001.msg_system: Entering Otohime Land will begin a scene which will conclude the demo. Please keep this in mind if you wish to explore more of the city, play minigames, or spend time battling enemies.

system_btl04_0005_001.msg_system: Enemies will look different in battle, thanks to Kasuga's vivid imagination.

mj_citron01.msg_system:
[Ranking][Beginner/Intermediate][Advanced]
1st+10,000 pts.+20,000 pts.
2nd+5,000 pts.+10,000 pts.
3rd-5,000 pts.-10,000 pts.
4th-10,000 pts.-20,000 pts.

1st+30,000 pts.+30,000 pts.
2nd+10,000 pts.+10,000 pts.
3rd-10,000 pts.-10,000 pts.
4th-30,000 pts.-30,000 pts.

mj_reach01.msg_system:
[Ranking][Intermediate][Advanced]
1st+10,000 pts.+20,000 pts.
2nd+5,000 pts.+10,000 pts.
3rd-5,000 pts.-10,000 pts.
4th-10,000 pts.-20,000 pts.

shogi_rule.msg_system:
Three ways to play Shogi.
[Ranked] Played following the basic rules. The difficulty will increase with each defeated opponent. Once you've defeated all opponents in the Kyu rank, you may then face off against those in the Dan rank.
[Challenge] Played on a special type of board. 
[Puzzle] Play against opponents on a special type of board and call checkmate within a specified number of moves.

system_adv_tgs_002.msg_system: You can now change jobs. Speak to Ririka whenever you wish to do so.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_010_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 5 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_020_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win without using any skills or using help from others.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_030_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Do not switch members during battle.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_900_001.msg_system: Going back will mean starting over from the 1st floor or the checkpoint.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_040_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win using only Kasuga's attacks or skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_050_001.msg_system:
Rules

No switching members during battle.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_050_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 10 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_060_001.msg_system:
Rules

Attacks from allies and enemies will always land a critical hit.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_060_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win without using any Recovery skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_070_001.msg_system:
Rules

Allies and enemies will be lighter during battle.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_080_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win using only Adachi's attacks or skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_090_001.msg_system:
Rules

Poison will slowly decrease your health.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_090_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 15 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_100_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 20 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_110_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win using only Nanba's attacks or skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_120_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win using only Saeko's attacks or skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_130_001.msg_system:
Rules

Skills may be used without limit.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_130_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win without reviving fallen allies.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_140_001.msg_system:
Rules

Poundmates may be used without limit.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_140_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win without have any allies knocked out.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_150_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 25 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_160_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 30 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_180_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 35 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_190_001.msg_system:
Rules

Fallen allies cannot be revived.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_190_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win using only Joon-gi Han's attacks or skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_210_001.msg_system:
Rules

Susceptibility to fire element every 5 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_220_001.msg_system:
Rules

Susceptibility to ice element every 5 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_220_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 45 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_230_001.msg_system:
Rules

Susceptibility to electric element every 5 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_230_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 50 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_240_001.msg_system:
Rules

Bleed status occurs every 5 turns.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_240_002.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win using only Zhao's attacks or skills.

system_dgn_adv12_s100_200_001.msg_system:
Additional Reward Condition

Win within 40 turns.

nakama12.msg_system: Nanba rejoined the party with a new skill - Essence of Pyro Prison !

job_change_01.msg_system: Kasuga's job changed from Arakawa Loyalist to Deadbeat.

job_change_02.msg_system: Kasuga's job changed from Deadbeat to Freelancer.

system_adv_sub_a16_030_001.msg_system: The Sujidex app was installed on Kasuga's smartphone.

skill01.msg_system: Kasuga can now use the skill Hero's Vigor.

system_dgn_adv99_y099_010_001.msg_system:
Final Millennium Tower

You can now challenge the game's most difficult dungeon. Once you've boarded the elevator, the retry option will be disabled until you defeat the tower's manager waiting for you at the top.

system_adv_demo_001.msg_system: This content is not available in the trial version. The full release awaits!

system_btl04_0010_001.msg_system: Auto-Battle Mode can now be selected. Press <symbol=button_l2> to turn Auto-Battle Mode ON/OFF. Hold down <symbol=button_l2> and use <platform_type_not=pc>the ${platform.term.dpad}</platform_type_not><platform_type=pc><symbol=button_up><symbol=button_down><symbol=button_left><symbol=button_right></platform_type> to make a selection.

system_activesearch_sub_a01.msg_system: Active Search Mode will place you in first-person view, where you'll be able to move using <symbol=button_l_stick> and look around using <symbol=button_r_stick>. Put on those detective specs and find Nancy-chan!

system_activesearch_sub_a18.msg_system: Active Search Mode will place you in first-person view, where you'll be able to move using <symbol=button_l_stick> and look around using <symbol=button_r_stick>. Put on those detective specs and find the real Michio-kun!

system_ka_tutorial_001.msg_system: Go to Properties to check the details of your properties. Select Properties.

system_ka_tutorial_002.msg_system: Go to Assign to change employees assigned to your properties. Select Assign, then Ichiban Confections.

system_ka_tutorial_003.msg_system: Each property has ability requirements that affect profit. If your products, services, and reputation are not up to par, you may face difficulties in your business like diminishing sales and unforeseen issues.

system_ka_tutorial_004.msg_system: Make sure to stay above the products, services, and reputation requirements by switching around your assigned employees.

system_ka_tutorial_005.msg_system: Go to Employees to check the details of your employees. Select Employees, then Employee List.

system_ka_tutorial_006.msg_system: The wages of employees who are not assigned to a property are paid in the form of Surplus Labor Costs, which are deducted from sales. Try to avoid risking your business by laying off these employees when conditions are not satisfactory.

system_btl_dgn00.msg_system: Yokohama Underground Dungeon unlocked. You can access it through the manhole you used to escape from the Yokohama Liumang. Exploring this dungeon will not only make you stronger, but you might even find rare materials and items.

system_btl_dgn01.msg_system: Kamurocho Underground Dungeon unlocked. You can access it through the manhole at Theater Alley where you infiltrated the former Heian Tower. Exploring this dungeon will not only make you stronger, but you might even find rare materials and items.

ginnokagi.msg_system: Obtained Silver Safe Skeleton Key. This key will allow you to open all silver safes scattered throughout the city.

system_dgn_y999_999_001.msg_system: Use the ladders you find inside to return to the ground floor. Be careful not to push yourself too far ahead.

nicks_mission_failed_001.msg_system: Fined 100,000 yen for not meeting Nick Ogata's condition in time.

nicks_mission_failed_003.msg_system: Fined 1,000,000 yen for not meeting Nick Ogata's condition in time.

eri_kizuna.msg_system: Unlike the rest of your party members, Eri's bond level only increases as you grow your business. Increasing her bond has many benefits, such as giving her access to new jobs and skills. Keep your business skills sharp to deepen your bond with Eri!

lost_item.msg_system: Your money has been sent to the convenience store ATM, and your items have been sent to the Item Box.

nanba_kizuna_010.msg_system: Progress through the main story to deepen your bond with Nanba.

system_dgn_adv99_k100_010_001.msg_system:
True Final Millennium Tower

Remember the game's most difficult dungeon? Well that was a joke. The True Final Millennium Tower is this game's real challenge. Badasses only.
Rec. Level: 99
Rec. Job Rank: 90

system_dgn_adv99_k100_020_001.msg_system: Only a true hero could conquer the True Final Millennium Tower.

system_dgn_adv99_k100_020_002.msg_system: Congratulations! You've earned our respect and admiration!
